thread.title: Jemma Lucy does a striptease from hospital knickers and gown to celebrate her new boobs

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Jemma Lucy does a striptease from hospital knickers and gown to celebrate her new boobs
text:
Jemma Lucy does a striptease from hospital knickers and gown to celebrate her new boobs Spoiler alert: Paper pants are not the height of sexy Share Jemma used her actual op as an op to get racy for the camera Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jemma Lucy has celebrated getting a boob job by posing for an impromptu photo shoot in a hospital gown and paper pants. 
The tattooed reality star performed a surgical striptease in the standard-issue clothing on the day she was due to get her cleavage enlarged from an already ample G cup to something even more substantial. 
Jemma , 28, tweeted on Monday morning that she was off to the hospital, but didn’t elaborate on what was getting done bar adding two melon emoji to her tweet. Jemma poses in her paper pants and hospital gown (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS) This wouldn't happen on the NHS thank goodness (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS) Just no (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS) Jemma's tweet (Photo: @Jem_Lucy/Twitter) 
Last month, Jemma revealed she was desperate to get her boobs done again to boost her assets beyond her current G cup - which would be her second boob job. 
In February, Jemma Snapchatted her cleavage plans to fans, telling them: “I”m going bigger” 
But in the footage, a friend of Jemma’s is heard yelling, “You don’t need another boob job!” and the pair bicker back and forth about the enlargement. Jemma using her boobs as a drinks holder on holiday last month (Photo: jemlucy/snapchat) Jemma and Chantelle, who was in Geordie Shore (Photo: jemlucy/snapchat) 
Ex On The Beach contestant Jemma has been seeking out fame ever since appearing on screens back in 2005, most recently putting out the bins in her pants and pretending to hook up with Charlotte Dawson and then Chantelle Connelly for the benefit of every watching camera. 
Even though Chantelle admitting the pair's relationship was fake and purely for financial gain , Jemma and Chantelle have continued to try and convince everyone they're a couple. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
